russian.print: Yvonne: I’d like to book a room for the next week.
You: Uh, okay. What’s your name?
Yvonne: Yvonne. Did you not read the dialogue?
You: Uh... What tier would you like?
You: Wait, are you a guitar player?
Yvonne: No, this is strictly for business purposes.

russian_no.print: Yvonne: What a shame. Better be extra careful then, they’re watching.

shampoo.print: Yvonne: Hey, my room’s out of shampoo. Do you mind if I get more?
You: Sorry, we only have conditioner at the moment.
You: You might have to wait until tomorrow until we give out shampoo again.
Yvonne: Hey come on, I really need it. Can’t you just sneak one under the counter for me?

shampoo_yes.print: Yvonne: Thanks. I’ll be sure to put in a good word for you to my bosses.

shampoo_no.print: You: Sorry, don’t want to get sent to the gulags by my boss or anything.
I’ll have to go out and pick some up then.
You’ve just made this game a little harder for yourself though, good luck.
